queries.text: What are the restricted payments under the facility? In other words, what restrictions exist on any upstreaming of cash-flows from the borrower to its shareholders/promoters/sponsors? These would include restrictions on upstreaming of any nature, including restrictions on dividend payments, repayment of promoter loans, etc. Restrict yourself to explicit clauses in the <document> to this effect, and do not make any inferences. Mention the specific clause number/clause title for each response.
